backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing player stress, scene state, progression flags, save spots, and barricaded doors with update/query methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files and components for lighting and UI behavior changes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files describing gameplay, UI, lighting, AI, and input systems.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH theme variables for light/dark modes and base layout behavior.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML document setting up full-viewport layout and loading the React entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App wrapper applying dark theme and rendering the GameView at full size.
frontend/src/game/Audio/audioSettingsSto: Zustand store persisting audio volume and mute settings with simple setters.
Hook generating positional tension audio via Web Audio, adjusting intensity by distance, volume, and mouth-reveal state.
frontend/src/game/Dialogue/DialogueConte: Dialogue context managing a timed queue of lines, visibility state, and sequencing logic for UI dialogue.
frontend/src/game/Dialogue/scriptedLines: Static collection of short enemy threat lines used by dialogue triggers.
frontend/src/game/Enemies/GreenHood/gree: AI hook controlling idle, patrol, and chase states using player distance and triggering dialogue threats.
frontend/src/game/Enemies/GreenHood/Gree: Green Hood enemy entity handling model rendering, movement, AI integration, and imperative controls for hood and speed.
3D model of the Green Hood with hood, glowing eyes, and an optional revealed mouth with teeth.
frontend/src/game/Gameplay/hoodFallMecha: Implements a timing-based hood fall event with look detection and stress penalties using vector math.
frontend/src/game/GameView.tsx: Sets up the main game view with React Three Fiber, loading the world, player controller, scene director, and HUD inside a DialogueProvider.
frontend/src/game/Input/useInputMode.ts: Detects touch vs keyboard/mouse and routes movement, look, and interaction inputs accordingly.
frontend/src/game/Input/useKeyboardMouse: Tracks WASD movement, mouse look deltas, and interact key presses via event listeners and an update interval.
frontend/src/game/Input/useTouchLook.ts: Calculates look deltas from touch movement on the right half of the screen with periodic updates.
frontend/src/game/Player/PlayerControlle: Applies movement and camera rotation based on input, updates player position, and keeps camera at head height.
frontend/src/game/Scenes/SceneDirector.t: Triggers scripted dialogue events based on the current scene, including a timed intro line.
frontend/src/game/State/usePlayerState.t: Loads and manages player state from the backend actor with helpers for updating stress, scene, items, and save status.
frontend/src/game/World/FacilityWorld.ts: Defines lighting and basic cafeteria/corridor geometry, including a flickering light and spawning the GreenHood enemy.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login state and helpers using AuthClient, exposing identity and login actions via context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps player state fetching and stress updates with React Query, tied to the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers, color tokens, horror-themed styles, and utility classes for the appâ€™s visual theme.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider and loads global styles.
Renders a touch-friendly interact button that triggers a short interact input pulse.
Displays a temporary interact prompt message when available.
Implements a touch-based virtual joystick that outputs normalized movement input.
frontend/src/ui/Dialogue/DialogueBox.tsx: Shows a stylized bottom-screen dialogue line when the dialogue system is active.
frontend/src/ui/Hud/HudShell.tsx: Assembles HUD elements including vignette, stress bar, mobile controls, prompts, dialogue, fade overlay, and settings panel.
frontend/src/ui/Hud/StressIndicator.tsx: Displays player stress value with color-coded percentage and progress bar.
frontend/src/ui/Overlays/FadeToBlack.tsx: Fades the screen to black over time when activated.
frontend/src/ui/Overlays/HoodVignetteOve: Applies a hood-shaped vignette overlay for atmospheric framing.
frontend/src/ui/Settings/SettingsPanel.t: Modal panel providing audio settings including volume and mute controls.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme with custom color tokens, fonts, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Describes project state, features, issues, and design notes for the horror game build.
